  • Method Details

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> login(@RequestBody User user)
      Checks received user for valid login info. Uses userService to retrieve info from database and compares passwords with passwordEncoder.
      Parameters:
      user - user info for login
      Returns:
      jwt for user and http status

    • detailsFromJwt

      @PostMapping("/jwtUserDetails") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> detailsFromJwt(@RequestBody String token)
      Uses jwt to check role. Sends details if valid.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt stored on frontend
      Returns:
      user details and http status

    • createAccount

      @PostMapping("/create/{token}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> createAccount(@PathVariable String token, @RequestBody User user)
      Creates account and uses provided jwt to authenticate and authorize. Limits number of users in database to 10.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      user - user
      Returns:
      success of adding user and http status

    • deleteAccount

      @PostMapping("/delete/{token}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> deleteAccount(@PathVariable String token, @RequestBody User user)
      Uses jwt to check role. Removes user from db.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      user - user
      Returns:
      success of removing user and http status

    • getUsers

      @PostMapping("/getAll") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getUsers(@RequestBody String token)
      Uses jwt to check role. Sends all guest user info to frontend.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      Returns:
      list of all users and http status

    • saveMazeInfo

      @PostMapping("/saveMaze/{token}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> saveMazeInfo(@PathVariable String token, @RequestBody int[][] maze)
      Uses jwt to check username and role. If less than 10 mazes for user, add maze to db.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      maze - maze to save
      Returns:
      success of saving maze and http status

    • removeMazeInfo

      @PostMapping("/deleteMaze/{token}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> removeMazeInfo(@PathVariable String token, @RequestBody int index)
      Uses jwt to check username and role. Removes provided maze from db.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      index - index of maze to remove
      Returns:
      success of removing maze and http status

    • getMazeInfo

      @PostMapping("/getMazes") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getMazeInfo(@RequestBody String token)
      Uses jwt to check username and role. Gets mazes for user.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      Returns:
      list of saved mazes and http status, sends info as JSON

    • getTimeRemaining

      @PostMapping("/getJwtTime") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getTimeRemaining(@RequestBody String token)
      Uses Jwts package to check remaining time on jwt.
      Parameters:
      token - jwt
      Returns:
      time left
